tool_description: data from gogoanime website for anime website building and stuff.
title: gogoanime-data-api

api_list.name: GetSinglePageInfo
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gogoanime-data-api.p.rapidapi.com/{link}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gogoanime-data-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetRecentAnimes
api_list.description: Get Animes From googanime Recent Page
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gogoanime-data-api.p.rapidapi.com/recent/{pagenumber}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gogoanime-data-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
